g++ -g -Wall -Werror -std=c++17 CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/test/server.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/base/CurrentThread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/Acceptor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/Buffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/Channel.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/Epoll.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/EventLoop.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/TcpConnection.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/TcpServer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/ThreadPool.cpp.o CMakeFiles/echoserver.dir/tcp/util.cpp.o -o test/echoserver
